Name: Ptah-Sokar-Osiris statuette
Description: This wooden statuette shows Ptah-Sokar-Osiris in the shape of a mummy. The small face, painted green, is framed by a blue striated wig. The original head-dress is lost. On the chest is an ornate collar, striped red and green and consisting of multiple rows. The body is red, the right side is covered with a black net. The two vertical columns of text, on the front and the back, contain the offering formula. The plaster covering is damaged or missing in several places.
